mapper.select: select ii.*, product.name product_name, product.scale product_scale, product.index product_index from ord_deliverer_order_item ii, ent_product product where ii.sys_status = 1 and product.sys_status = 1 and ii.product_id = product.id and ii.deliverer_order_id = #{id} order by product.index

select delivererOrder.*, driver.name driver, out_order_recorder.name out_order_recorder, line.name line_name, store.store_name, store.store_holder, store.address from ord_deliverer_order delivererOrder, ent_driver driver, ent_out_order_recorder out_order_recorder, ent_line line, ent_store store where delivererOrder.sys_status = 1 and delivererOrder.driver_id = driver.id and delivererOrder.order_recorder_id = out_order_recorder.id and delivererOrder.line_id = line.id and delivererOrder.store_id = store.id
and concat(delivererOrder.order_date, driver.name, out_order_recorder.name) like "%${keyword}%"
order by if(isnull(delivererOrder.modified_time),0,delivererOrder.modified_time) desc,delivererOrder.created_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into ord_deliverer_order ( id, order_date, driver_id, store_id, delivery_date, order_recorder_id, total_price, line_id, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( #{id}, #{order_date}, #{driver_id}, #{store_id}, #{delivery_date}, #{order_recorder_id}, #{total_price}, #{line_id}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ord_deliverer_order set order_date = #{order_date}, driver_id = #{driver_id}, store_id = #{store_id}, delivery_date = #{delivery_date}, order_recorder_id = #{order_recorder_id}, total_price = #{total_price}, line_id = #{line_id}, is_out = #{is_out}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update ord_deliverer_order set sys_status = 0, modifier_id = #{modifier_id}, modified_time = now() where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ord_deliverer_order_item ( id, deliverer_order_id, product_id, quantity, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( uuid(), #{deliverer_order_id}, #{product_id}, #{quantity}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ord_deliverer_order_item set quantity = #{quantity}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update ord_deliverer_order_item set sys_status = 0, modified_time = now() where deliverer_order_id=#{deliverer_order_id}
